TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE , GPE region , GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , Mr PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On an unidentified date the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of Gorlovka against her employer , the “ GPE ” private joint stock company ( ORG « PERSON ) , claiming salary arrears .
On DATE the court found for the applicant and awarded her CARDINAL NORP hryvnas .
In DATE LOC instituted enforcement proceedings .

On DATE by the decision of ORG the debtor was declared bankrupt . The writs of enforcement have been transferred to the liquidation commission . The judgement of DATE , however , has never been enforced .
